About Us

-----OUR STORY-------

Spinning & Drifting Scene in South Africa, has served as an upliftment to a variety of communities
Keeping children and bad habits any from them, has been the fore-front of the sport
As more children start participating in the sport.
We are able to provide them competitions where prizes are to be won and opportunites
to build and modify cars, that are being endorsed by companies to represent their brands

Drivers of all ages come in skilled with craft of spinning.
The Number one rule is SAFETY and WE ENSURE THAT ALL SPINNING
IS DONE ON THE TRACK.

Over the past 3years, the rapid growth of the sport has been showcased on a various Televisions and Newspapers shows
from shows such as Thrill Seekers, Carte Blanche, So You Think You Can Spin
are amongst the many media sources that show the sport.

Join Us

In the supporting of the scene
